step_feedback.feedback: For step 1, try to keep your shoulders and wrists a bit more stable. Focus on a smooth stretch overhead.
In step 2, aim for more consistent elbow movement. Keep your wrists steady as you stretch your arms back.
During step 3, focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together more. Try to keep your wrists from moving too much.
For step 4, work on keeping your shoulders and elbows more aligned. Your wrists showed some extra movement here.
In step 5, try to maintain better control of your wrists. Focus on a smooth exhale and relaxation.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms straight overhead and focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together. Try to relax your wrists more as you exhale.
